SELECT DomainID AS DomainID , DomainCode AS DomainCode , DisplayName AS DisplayName , MultiDisplayName AS MultiDisplayName FROM SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN WHERE 1=1 AND IsUse = 'Y'
AND DomainCode = #{domainCode}

SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang},MULTICODENAME) AS CodeName , CODE AS Code FROM sys_base_code sbc WHERE BIZSECTION = 'System' AND CODEGROUP = 'PasswordPolicy' AND ISUSE = 'Y' AND DomainID = (SELECT DomainID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_code WHERE BizSection = 'System' AND Code = sbc.Code AND CodeGroup = 'PasswordPolicy' ORDER BY IF(DomainID = #{domainID}, 0, 1) LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY SORTKEY

SELECT DOMAINID AS DomainID , ISUSECOMPLEXITY AS IsUseComplexity , MAXCHANGEDATE AS MaxChangeDate , MINIMUMLENGTH AS MinimumLength , CHANGENOTICEDATE AS ChangeNoticeDate , SpecialCharacterPolicy AS SpecialCharacterPolicy FROM SYS_OBJECT_PW_POLICY WHERE DOMAINID IN (0, #{domainID}) ORDER BY DOMAINID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT DOMAINID AS DomainID , ISUSECOMPLEXITY AS IsUseComplexity , MAXCHANGEDATE AS MaxChangeDate , MINIMUMLENGTH AS MinimumLength , CHANGENOTICEDATE AS ChangeNoticeDate , SpecialCharacterPolicy AS SpecialCharacterPolicy FROM SYS_OBJECT_PW_POLICY WHERE 1=1 AND DOMAINID = #{domainID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_OBJECT_PW_POLICY WHERE 1=1 AND DOMAINID = #{domainID}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_base_config (ConfigID, BizSection, DomainID, SettingKey, SettingValue, IsCheck, IsUse, ConfigType, ConfigName, Description, RegisterCode, RegistDate, ModifierCode, ModifyDate) VALUES ((SELECT c.ConfigID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_base_config c WHERE c.SettingKey = #{SettingKey} AND c.DomainID = #{domainID}) , 'Admin',#{domainID},#{SettingKey},#{SettingValue},'Y','Y',#{ConfigType},#{ConfigName},#{Description},#{RegID},now(3),#{ModID},now(3)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SettingValue = #{SettingValue} , ModifierCode = #{ModID} , ModifyDate = now(3)
